topics.body:
I think the worst condition my body has been in is when my long tore open and they had me on a lot of morphine
... DIDNT STOP THE PAIN but boy was I loopy.

Meanwhile I'm telling the doctors "don't cut me open" and I was laughing.
Then the next day they told me "Sideward, ya almost died and all you were doing was laughing and talking to the nurses"


So ya
Drugs
